name: blogger.relatedposts
tagline: Blogger plugin for createing related post list.
body:
This plugin generate related posts list atuomaticaly according to the label data.

### Features
Main feature is followin.

 * Generate related posts list automaticaly.


### Usage
This plugin requires "google feed api". so, include `https://www.google.com/jsapi` and load `feeds`.
Configuration of this plugin is following.
```javascript
var RELATEDPOSTS_SETTINGS = {
    BlogUrl: 'garafu.blogspot.jp',
    MaxResults: 5,
    TitleVisible: true,
    ThumbnailVisible: true,
    SnippetVisible: true,
    NoThumbnailImageUrl: 'http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9mCCaXTpn9I/VN4hDMsFXlI/AAAAAAAAC6U/i84N2Ng37Ik/s1600/noimage.png',
    NoRelatedPostsMessage: 'No Related Posts...',
    LabelElementId: '',
    OutputElementId: ''
};
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
